title: A possible origin of Lee Sin?

embed.description: I don't own this. No copyright infringement intended. I like this scene and lesson. Master Kan: Had you good cause to risk this danger? Caine: My purpose was to prove my agility and my courage. Master Kan: I had hoped such qualities were already yours. Caine: I sought to test them.

body:
I was just wondering whether this old classic film/series 'Kung Fu' had anything to with Lee Sin's concept, as seen in the clip with character Kwai Chang Caine their appearance is very similar as is their martial fighting style, they even talk alike (kind of slowed English) both committed an act that they are ashamed of and are in self imposed banishment, both are monks, Caine is a Shaolin monk and Lee is a Shojin monk, Kwai Chang Caine's master was also blind Like Lee Sin is.

Just a thought that maybe someone at riot was influenced by this classic series
So much else in the game is influenced from things like this
What do you guys think?
